SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( ORDER BY t.modify_time DESC, t.create_time DESC ) AS row_num, t.pk_carrier, t.dr,t.ts, t.carr_code,t.carr_name,t.carr_type,t.priority,t.pk_corp,t.pk_customer,t.phone,t.mobile,t.email,t.contact,t.contact_post, t.address,t.locked_flag,t.create_time,t.billing_rule,t.check_status FROM ts_carrier t where t.dr=0
and t.carr_code like #{pattern}

SELECT pk_carrier, dr,ts, carr_code, carr_name,carr_type,priority,pk_corp,pk_customer, phone,mobile,road_trans_license, email,contact,contact_post,address,locked_flag,create_time,billing_rule,carrier_picture,driver_license, id_card_pos,id_card_neg,check_status,driving_licence FROM ts_carrier where dr= 0
and pk_carrier =#{pkCarrier}
mapper.update: update ts_carrier set locked_flag= #{status} where pk_carrier=#{pkCarrier}

update nw_corp set ts=#{ts},modify_user=#{modifyUser},modify_time=#{modifyTime}, check_status=#{checkStatus} where dr=0 and pk_corp = (select t.pk_corp from ts_re_carr_corp t where t.pk_carrier=#{pkCarrier} and t.dr=0)
mapper.select: select t2.pk_user from ts_carrier t1 LEFT JOIN nw_user t2 on t1.carr_code = t2.user_code where t1.dr=0 and t2.dr=0 and t1.pk_carrier=#{pkCarrier}
select count(0) from ts_carrier where invite_code = #{inviteCode}
